items.content_html: So I was looking at crossposting, since I still have a few friends on various social networks that I’d like to keep in touch with, and it turns out Instagram doesn’t let you create posts via their API. Like, at all (unless you have a business account). Seems wild, no?
items.content_text: So I was looking at crossposting, since I still have a few friends on various social networks that I'd like to keep in touch with, and it turns out Instagram doesn't let you _create posts_ via their API. Like, at all (unless you have a business account). Seems wild, no?
